tool_description: Reconciles financial balances, refunds, and credits for accounts during suspension and reactivation periods.

suspension_start_date.description: Start date of the suspension period

suspension_end_date.description: End date of suspension period (current date if not specified)

reconciliation_type.description: Type of reconciliation: full, partial, service_credits_only

refund_policy.description: Refund policy to apply: standard, prorated, no_refund, goodwill

error_messages: Invalid date range: suspension_start_date must be before suspension_end_date.
Account not found: The specified account_id does not exist or is not accessible.
No suspension record: Cannot reconcile account with no suspension history in specified period.
Invalid reconciliation type: Use one of [full, partial, service_credits_only].
Invalid refund policy: Use one of [standard, prorated, no_refund, goodwill].
Financial system unavailable: Cannot process reconciliation due to payment system maintenance.
usage: Provide account_id and suspension_start_date; optionally specify suspension_end_date, reconciliation_type, and refund_policy to control the reconciliation scope and approach.

reconciliation_id.description: Unique identifier for this reconciliation transaction

service_credits_issued.description: Amount of service credits issued to account

processing_status.description: Status of reconciliation: completed, pending, failed, requires_manual_review

transaction_items.description: List of individual reconciliation items processed
